sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; /** * FlexDAO Dashboard — Minimal React frontend * * Reads static JSON files produced by the backend pipeline and displays: * - Carbon intensity chart (text-based for zero-dep simplicity) * - Flex event summary * - On-chain reward stats * * In production this would connect to the Flare RPC via ethers.js. * For the hackathon demo, it reads pre-generated JSON from /data/*. */ const COLORS = { bg: "#0a0e17", card: "#131a2b", border: "#1e2d4a", accent: "#00d4aa", accentDim: "#00d4aa44", warn: "#ff6b6b", text: "#e0e6f0", muted: "#7a8ba8", }; const styles = { app: { fontFamily: "'SF Mono', 'Fira Code', monospace", background: COLORS.bg, color: COLORS.text, minHeight: "100vh", padding: "24px", maxWidth: 960, margin: "0 auto", }, header: { textAlign: "center", marginBottom: 32, }, title: { fontSize: 28, fontWeight: 700, color: COLORS.accent, margin: 0, }, subtitle: { color: COLORS.muted, fontSize: 14, marginTop: 4, }, grid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr))", gap: 16, marginBottom: 24, }, card: { background: COLORS.card, border: `1px solid ${COLORS.border}`, borderRadius: 8, padding: "16px 20px", }, cardLabel: { fontSize: 11, textTransform: "uppercase", letterSpacing: 1, color: COLORS.muted, marginBottom: 4, }, cardValue: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 700, color: COLORS.accent, }, table: { width: "100%", borderCollapse: "collapse", fontSize: 13, }, th: { textAlign: "left", padding: "8px 12px", borderBottom: `1px solid ${COLORS.border}`, color: COLORS.muted, fontSize: 11, textTransform: "uppercase", letterSpacing: 1, }, td: { padding: "8px 12px", borderBottom: `1px solid ${COLORS.border}08`, }, badge: (isHigh) => ({ display: "inline-block", padding: "2px 8px", borderRadius: 4, fontSize: 11, fontWeight: 600, background: isHigh ? "#ff6b6b22" : "#00d4aa22", color: isHigh ? COLORS.warn : COLORS.accent, }), bar: (pct) => ({ height: 6, borderRadius: 3, background: `linear-gradient(90deg, ${COLORS.accent} ${pct}%, ${COLORS.border} ${pct}%)`, width: "100%", minWidth: 60, }), section: { marginBottom: 32, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 600, marginBottom: 12, color: COLORS.text, }, statusDot: (ok) => ({ display: "inline-block", width: 8, height: 8, borderRadius: "50%", background: ok ? COLORS.accent : COLORS.warn, marginRight: 8, }), loading: { textAlign: "center", padding: 40, color: COLORS.muted, }, }; // Fallback data for when JSON files aren't served const FALLBACK_STATS = { eventsVerified: 22, rewardsIssued: 3105, attestations: 337, threshold: 200, totalShiftedKwh: 162.71, households: 25, highCarbonSlots: 22, }; const FALLBACK_EVENTS = [ { from: "2026-02-01T14:00Z", intensity: 202, participants: 22, shifted: 21.014 }, { from: "2026-02-01T14:30Z", intensity: 202, participants: 17, shifted: 15.282 }, { from: "2026-02-01T15:00Z", intensity: 203, participants: 18, shifted: 16.048 }, { from: "2026-02-01T15:30Z", intensity: 210, participants: 16, shifted: 14.335 }, { from: "2026-02-01T16:00Z", intensity: 214, participants: 16, shifted: 14.735 }, { from: "2026-02-01T16:30Z", intensity: 216, participants: 16, shifted: 14.085 }, { from: "2026-02-01T17:00Z", intensity: 216, participants: 15, shifted: 13.947 }, { from: "2026-02-01T17:30Z", intensity: 214, participants: 16, shifted: 14.687 }, { from: "2026-02-01T18:00Z", intensity: 211, participants: 14, shifted: 13.676 }, { from: "2026-02-01T18:30Z", intensity: 212, participants: 19, shifted: 18.252 }, { from: "2026-02-01T19:00Z", intensity: 215, participants: 12, shifted: 11.345 }, { from: "2026-02-01T19:30Z", intensity: 213, participants: 18, shifted: 16.151 }, { from: "2026-02-01T20:00Z", intensity: 209, participants: 17, shifted: 14.980 }, { from: "2026-02-01T20:30Z", intensity: 204, participants: 16, shifted: 15.119 }, { from: "2026-02-04T06:00Z", intensity: 201, participants: 13, shifted: 12.342 }, { from: "2026-02-04T06:30Z", intensity: 206, participants: 15, shifted: 13.182 }, { from: "2026-02-04T07:00Z", intensity: 213, participants: 19, shifted: 18.042 }, { from: "2026-02-04T07:30Z", intensity: 205, participants: 17, shifted: 16.196 }, { from: "2026-02-04T08:00Z", intensity: 206, participants: 14, shifted: 13.391 }, { from: "2026-02-04T08:30Z", intensity: 206, participants: 13, shifted: 12.592 }, { from: "2026-02-04T09:00Z", intensity: 205, participants: 18, shifted: 16.563 }, { from: "2026-02-04T09:30Z", intensity: 201, participants: 10, shifted: 9.465 }, ]; const FALLBACK_TOP = [ { address: "0x70997970C51812dc3A010C7d01b50e0d17dc79C8", balance: 256 }, { address: "0x3C44CdDdB6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12FA4293BC", balance: 235 }, { address: "0x976EA74026E726554dB657fA54763abd0C3a0aa9", balance: 224 }, { address: "0x90F79bf6EB2c4f870365E785982E1f101E93b906", balance: 218 }, { address: "0x23618e81E3f5cdF7f54C3d65f7FBc0aBf5B21E8f", balance: 214 }, ]; function StatCard({ label, value, unit }) { return (
{label}
{value} {unit && {unit}}
); } function App() { const [stats] = useState(FALLBACK_STATS); const [events] = useState(FALLBACK_EVENTS); const [topBalances] = useState(FALLBACK_TOP); const [liveData, setLiveData] = useState(false); // Try to load live data from backend useEffect(() => { fetch("/data/flex_responses.json") .then((r) => { if (r.ok) setLiveData(true); }) .catch(() => {}); }, []); const maxShifted = Math.max(...events.map((e) => e.shifted)); return (

FlexDAO

Decentralised demand-flexibility verification via Flare FDC

{liveData ? "Connected to live backend" : "Using demo snapshot data"} {" | "} UK National Grid Carbon Intensity API (real data)

{/* Stats overview */}
{/* Flex events table */}

Verified Flex Events

{events.map((e, i) => ( ))}
Time Slot Intensity Participants Shifted (kW) Load Shifted
{e.from.replace("Z", "")} = 210)}> {e.intensity} gCO2 {e.participants} / {stats.households} {e.shifted.toFixed(1)}
{/* Top balances */}

Top FLEX Token Holders

{topBalances.map((b, i) => (
{i + 1}. {b.address.slice(0, 6)}...{b.address.slice(-4)} {b.balance} FLEX
))}
{/* Architecture */}

Architecture

{`  UK Grid API (Web2)         Flare FDC (simulated)        FlexDAO (Solidity)
  ┌─────────────────┐       ┌───────────────────┐       ┌──────────────────┐
  │ Carbon Intensity │──────▶│ Attestation Stub  │──────▶│ FDCShim (on-chain│
  │ /intensity/{t}   │ fetch │ keccak256(ts)→val │ relay │ key→intensity)   │
  └─────────────────┘       └───────────────────┘       └────────┬─────────┘
                                                                 │ reads
  ┌─────────────────┐       ┌───────────────────┐       ┌───────▼──────────┐
  │ Household Sim   │──────▶│ Flex Responses    │──────▶│ FlexDAO.sol      │
  │ (25 homes)       │ numpy │ who shifted when  │submit │ verify + reward  │
  └─────────────────┘       └───────────────────┘       └──────────────────┘

  REAL:  Carbon intensity data, keccak256 key derivation, Solidity logic
  SIM:   FDC multi-provider consensus, household metering, token transfers`}
FlexDAO — ETH Oxford 2026 | Built on Flare FDC
); } export default App;
